diff_analysis.evidence: The patch adds escaping for typeahead suggestion HTML (mitigating XSS), introduces additional authorization checks (@RequiresAuthentication, @RequiresPermissions, and an explicit permission check on input termination), and adds non-proxy host handling and event bus posting. No new SQL usage, deserialization of untrusted data, CSRF-relevant state-changing endpoints without existing protections, or missing authorization paths are introduced. The new code does not create any of the listed CWE issues.
